Text: RE Im Leaving Enronof luck in your new endeavorsI imagine MA will be a beautiful area Original Message From mailto Sent Friday March AM Subject Im Leaving Enron I am going to be the Senior Regulatory Counsel at ISO New England starting on April My last day in the Portland area will be March I enjoyed working with you and wish you the best of everything My new address will be Mary Hain Senior Regulatory Counsel ISO New England Inc One Sullivan Road Holyoke MA SONEcom
